text: Cats with chronic vomiting and / or diarrhea were recruited by a multi - center group of primary care veterinarians in the greater Cincinnati region . Cats with at least one episode of vomiting and / or diarrhea per week for a minimum duration of 3 weeks , with no more than three episodes of vomiting daily were included . The vomitus excluded those defined as hairball only but could include hair material if present in addition to food and / or bile . Cats were at least 1 year of age , with a body condition score ( BCS ) between 2 and 4 on a 5 - point scale , and housed exclusively indoors . Cats were excluded if they were fed a veterinary therapeutic diet ; had a known food allergy ; had a history of undesired weight loss in excess of 10 % over the last 2 months ; had received antibiotic therapy within the last month ; received long - acting immunosuppressive drugs within the past 6 weeks ; or had received any immunosuppressive drugs within 3 weeks prior to enrollment .
